line: Brian! Welcome home, you son of a bitch! So, did you lose? ! You got to tell me all about it. Hey, how was the bachelorette? Was she a dumb bimbo, like you said, but with a big rack? ( laughs ) Come on in and tell me everything. I bet your stories will make me laugh so hard I shoot milk out of my nose.

name: Brian
line: Um, Peter, this is Brooke, the bachelorette. She's, uh, having dinner with us tonight. I went over this with you a few minutes ago.

name: Peter
line: (laughing and then shooting milk out of his nose)

name: Joe
line: Peter, Lois, we h ave proof that it was Chris who vandalized Goldman's Pharmacy. I knew it. I knew it! I didn't want to believe it, but it's true.

name: JOE
line: Do you know what a cavity search is? You made my mom c

name: Quagmire
line: Glenn, would you feed Mittens?

name: Quagmire
line: Mittens has food in his bowl.

name: Quagmire
line: That's old food. (Mittens meowing )

name: Quagmire
line: Mittens, shut up. Mittens, shut up!

name: Quagmire
line: Don't you talk to Mittens that way! Mittens is a member of this family!

name: Quagmire
line: Mom, you want this three-way to happen, you're going to have to change your tone.

name: Brian
line: My God, you've just made me the happiest dog in the world. I love you, Brooke.

name: Brooke
line: I love you too, Brian. All right, that's a wrap. Well, it was great working with you, Brian. Good luck.

name: Brian
line: What? What are you talking about? Wh-What about us?

name: Michael Eisner
line: Hi , Brian.

name: Brian
line: Michael Eisner?

name: Michael
line: On behalf of ABC, I'd like to give you this parting gift.

name: Brian
line: The bill for the mansion?

name: Michael
line: No givesies backsies! ( phone line rings ) Uh, hey, Brooke. It's, uh, it's me again-- Brian. Hi. Wasn't sure if you got my last message. Or, uh, any of the other ones. Um, anyway, I'll just leave a quick message, 'cause you might be trying to call me right now and I don't want to tie up the line, so, I guess, um... Uh, I guess, yeah, give me a call. Okay, I'm hanging up. In three, two, one. Okay, call me back. I'll be here. All day. And tonight. Okay, bye. (phone rings) Uh, hey, me again. Thought I might have heard a voice when I was hanging up. Nope? Guess not. Okay, I will talk to you soon. Hello? No, sorry. Hey, babe, just trying you again, listening to our guy Coltrane... you know, okay... Anyway, I got a fax earlier about cheap airfare to Cancun. Didn't know if that was you trying to reach me. Uh, you know, let me give you my home number again, just in case you lost it... Electronic voice: voice mail is full. Damn.

name: Delivery Man
line: (doorbell ringing) Package for Brooke Roberts.

name: Brooke
line: Oh, that's me, thanks.

name: Brian
line: (on new machine) Uh, hey, there. Me again. Your voice mail was full, so I got you this answering machine. So, uh, what's go ing on?! I'm thinking about doing something tonight...

name: Brian
line: Hey, you're home.

name: Brooke
line: Listen, Brian, I want you to leave me alone or I am calling the cops.

name: Brian
line: ? Brooke, I'm so in love with you... ?

name: Doug
line: Aw! Oh! Aw! Aw! Chris, where the hell are we?

name: Chris
line: I told you, Doug, thi s is the bacon factory. Doctor, I need you to get rid of this zit!

name: Doug
line: You traitor!

name: Doctor
line: Whoa, that's a doozy. I bet some of those awful kids at school call you zit face. "No." Papa Zit? "No." Puss Peak? "No." Fat ass? Well, yeah. Tsk, tsk. Oh, that's terrible. Well, we're going to have to use some cortisone on that.

name: Doug
line: Oh, yeah? Two can play at that game. (gunshot) Don't think I won't do it, man!

name: Chris
line: All right, all right, let's all be cool here... (grunting)

name: Doctor
line: No! Whew! You okay, fat ass?

name: Brian
line: She told me she loved me, on what used to be a hit TV show. God, I can't believe I got sucked in to that phony reality world just like everyone else. I became the very thing I was mocking.

name: Stewie
line: Oh, I know it hurts now, Brian, but look at the bright side. You have some new material for that novel you've been writing. You know, the novel you've been working on. You know, the one you've been working on for three years? (voice rising in pitch): You know, the novel? Got something new to write about now, you know? Maybe your... maybe your main character gets into a relationship? (voices rises in pitch again) Suffers a little heartbreak? Something like what-what you've been... you've just been through? Draw from real-life experiences? A little heartbreak, you know, work it into the story? Make those characters a little more three dimensional? (very high pitch) A little richer experience for the reader? Make those second hundred pages really keep the reader guessing what's going to happen? Some twists and turns? (squeaking in high falsetto) A little epilogue? Everybody learns the hero's journey isn't always a happy one? (normal voice) Oh, I look forward to reading it.

name: Lois
line: Thanks for babysitting, Meg. We'll be back in a couple of hours.

name: Meg
line: I don't understand why I have to babysit Stewie. I mean, what's he really gonna do if we leave him by himself?

name: Stewie
line: And now to test my teleportation pods!

name: Stewie
line: Oh damn!

name: Stewie
line: I'M A MONSTER!

name: Stewie
line: So, um...t-this is, uh, awkward, but, uh, h-have we ever actually, you know, met? I mean y-you know I-I don't even know, say, for example, if you have a room up there. You know, a room? I have a room. You know, Meg, if you kill yourself now, you'll probably get a full page in the yearbook. So, um...you know, that's something to think about- (Stewie burps) Oh, I just burped.

name: Neil
line: Hi Meg, you busy Saturday night?

name: Meg
line: Neil, you ask me out, like, once a day, and I always give you the same answer: No!

name: Meg
line: God, I don't think I could have been any clearer the last time I turned him down.

name: Debra
line: Ray, your mother insulted my steak pizzola again.

name: Meg
line: Neil Goldman of Quahog, Rhode Island -- (Shouting) Leave me alone! I hate you! I hate you!

name: Debra
line: Anyway, your mother insulted--

name: Ray
line: (Cutting her off) I don't care anymore, Patty. After nine seasons, I just don't care. Maybe you could try not being a bitch.

name: Peter
line: Hey Mort, Lois and I are out on a date night, uh, why don't you give me some condoms? And some Excedrin. My wife's got a headache (moves his hands toward his crotch) THIS big. (laughing) You know? It's like from the commercial. (moves his hands toward his head) This big? Only it's my junk.

name: Mort
line: Alright, then. Twelve dollars and forty-three cents.

name: Peter
line: Aw, jeez, that's more of a ripoff than that breakfast machine I bought.

name: Peter
line: Gah! Ow! Ow, What was the point of all that? Ow, all it does is shoot ya! It doesn't make breakfast at all! Oww!

name: Peter
line: Besides, I forgot my wallet.

name: Mort
line: Well, that's ok, I'll just open up a tab.

name: Peter
line: Wait a minute, what the hell is a tab? Does that mean I don't gotta pay?

name: Mort
line: Well, not right now but--

name: Peter
line: (cutting Mort off) Aww sweet! Hey, while I'm at it, gimmie all these copies of Marie Claire. Y'know in case I wanna rub out that easy one before I get Lois into bed tonight.

name: Mort
line: Kathleen Turner's on page 45.

name: Peter
line: (excited) Kathleen Turner, eh, let's see how she looks and- (turns to the right page, not excited anymore) Aww, that's a shame.

name: TV Announcer
line: And now back to the Kids' Choice Awards, with host, Paula Poundstone!

name: Paula
line: (pointing into the audience) I choose you, and you, and you. So, come up!

name: Paula
line: (Shouting) I said let's go!

name: Stewie
line: (shouting from upstairs) Meg! Meg, I'm hungry! There's a granola bar in the cupboard, I want it!

name: Stewie
line: Hey. Hey! What's this? What's goin' on? Am I talking to myself up there?

name: Meg
line: Oh my God, Stewie! (Shouting) Just shut up and go to bed!

name: Stewie
line: Do you know what I do, Meg? I spit in your mouth while you sleep.

name: Meg
line: Finally! Look, mom, I've had it! I'm not babysitting anymore! It's Saturday night, I could be out having a life!

name: Lois
line: Meg, if you don't want to babysit anymore, that's fine, but don't you stand there and lie to me.

name: Peter
line: Oh Meg, she torched your ass, man! She torched your ass!

name: Meg
line: Why can't you just hire a real babysitter?

name: Lois
line: Well, I guess we could do that.

name: Stewie
line: Damn! I'm terrible at meeting new people...like the time I was on Blind Date!

name: Woman
line: I'm having a great time, Stewie.

name: Stewie
line: Me too. So, uh, you ready to go grab some 'za?

name: Woman
line: Uh...yea

name: Stewie
line: So, uh, wild guess here, but from the looks of your arm hair, I'm guessing you're Italian?

name: Peter
line: Alright, you guys, I got eight crates of Ipecac all on my tab. Now, whoever goes the longest without puking gets the last piece of pie in the fridge.

name: Peter
line: Ok, here we go...how's everybody doin?

name: Brian
line: Good, good so far.

name: Peter
line: Alright, alright.

name: Stewie
line: Nothing yet.

name: Peter
line: Cool, cool...You know, I dunno if you guys have had any of that pie already, but that is, uh, that is some tasty stuff. That's from the uh, bake sale that Lois was {suddenly throws up}

name: Stewie
line: OOh, one down. I know somebody who won't be having any {throws up}

name: Chris
line: I'm starting to feel funny.

name: Brian
line: Well, I feel fine. I guess I'm {throws up}

name: Chris
line: Oh boy! That means I win! I get to eat {throws up}

name: Stewie
line: Oh God, why didn't anybody tell me {throws up}

name: Peter
line: Oh my God, my insides are on {throws up}

name: Stewie
line: No, no please, no more, no more {throws up}

name: Chris
line: Dad, I'm scared. {throws up}

name: Brian
line: Get the phone, call 91-{throws up}

name: Peter
line: Lois! Lois get in here {walks backwards, throws up and hits the wall}

name: Brian
line: OK, ok. I think it's all gone. I think [throws up}

name: Stewie
line: I don't wanna, I don't wanna {throws up}

name: Brian
line: Peter, Peter, I need you to hold my ears {throws up}

name: Lois
line: Who wants chowder?

name: Peter
line: What the hell? Hey Meg, you better check this out.

name: Meg
line: Oh, God. This is so embarrassing. I can't believe this is happening to me.

name: Peter
line: Awww, looks like someone could use a greeting card to cheer 'em up. I put these on my tab. Here, take a "Far Side" one. The vulture thinks he's a cowboy! {laughs}

name: Meg
line: {Chuckles} It is kinda funny.

name: Quagmire
line: Hey, Peter, you got a card for if you transferred VD to somebody?

name: Peter
line: Uhh, let's see here...uhh...yep. "Sorry I accidentally gave you VD"

name: Quagmire
line: Aw, all you got is accidental, huh? All right, I'll take it.

name: Lois
line: Well, first let me thank you for answering the ad. Now, what do you feel qualifies you to be an effective babysitter for Stewie?

name: Stewie
line: Uh, yea, uh, we couldn't run an ad that said 'No Portuguese', but, um...no Portuguese.

name: Lois
line: So, I see here that you've worked for a family for a number of years. Can I call the uh..{squints at the clipboard} Herculoids for a reference?

name: Lois
line: I-I'm sorry, I don't understand.

name: Lois
line: The position has been filled.

name: Lois
line: The position has been filled, thank you very much, you can go now.

name: Lois
line: {Pissed off} LEAVE! NOW!

name: Lois
line: I didn't think it was going to be this hard to choose a babysitter.

name: Stewie
line: Yes, if only you were this discerning when you picked that happening hairdo.

name: Girl
line: Sorry I'm late. Can I still apply for the job?

name: Stewie
line: My God, I haven't been this exhilarated since Brian took me to see Les Miserables.

name: Announcer
line: Attention, ladies and gentlemen, there will be a slight change in the cast tonight.

name: Brian
line: Oh, no.

name: Announcer
line: For this evening's performance, the role of Jean Valjean will be played by Kirk Cameron.

name: Stewie
line: OH! Oh, unbelieveable! Oh my God! How lucky are we, huh? 'Hey Stewie, what are you doing tonight?' 'Oh, nothing, just watching KIRK CAMERON play Jean Valjean!' Oh my God! Curtain up!

name: Peter
line: Hey Mort, do these suppositories come in other flavors?

name: Mort
line: Peter, are you EATING those?

name: Peter
line: {sarcastic} No, I'm shoving them up my butt! Of course I'm eating them! Gimme a carton!

name: Mort
line: Peter, it's the end of the month, and I'm calling your tab! You owe me $34,000!

name: Peter
line: WHAT?! Aww, man, how am I gonna come up with that kinda money?

name: Mort
line: Peter, I'm waiting.

name: Peter
line: All right, all right, I got another idea. What if I sold you my daughter?

name: Mort
line: Huh?

name: Peter
line: You drop the tab, and your son can have Meg.

name: Meg
line: WHAT?!

name: Peter
line: Yup, all you gotta do is sign this contract.

name: Meg
line: ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND!? YOU CAN'T SELL ME, YOU FAT SON OF A BITCH!

name: Peter
line: Woaa! Careful getting this fish off the hook, Mort, she's got some fangs. {laughs}

name: Mort
line: What do you think of that, Neil? Daddy bought you a girlfriend!

name: Neil
line: Excuse me, if anybody's interested, I already have a girlfriend.

name: Meg
line: There's no way--wait what?

name: Girl
line: You ready to go, honey?

name: Neil
line: You rejected me too many times, Meg. I couldn't wait for you forever. Besides, Cecilia thinks my psoriasis is sexy.

name: Meg
line: I can't believe he's over me.

name: Mort
line: I can't believe I'm out 34 grand!

name: Peter
line: I can't believe it's not butter! {laughing} Stick around, more Family Guy comin' up!

name: Lois
line: Peter, how could you have tried to sell our daughter?

name: Peter
line: Alright, Lois. I don't want this to ruin our date night, so I'll make it up to ya.

name: Lois
line: Oh, Peter. {reading the card} "I'm sorry I tried to sell our daughter".

name: Peter
line: Yeah, you dunno how hard it was to find one of those in English.

name: Stewie
line: Ahh, tonight the babysitter comes, Rupert. Lovely LaDonne. Mmm...

name: Stewie
line: {imitating conversation} Oh, hey LaDonne. Hey, what's goin' on? How are you? Yea. Oh, just me, Stewie. Just, uh, bein' myself. Uh...yea..Oh, uh, wha, this here? Just my package. Yea, just, just uh, just uh, my package. God delivered it, I signed for it, the world keeps on spinning. Yea.

name: LaDonne
line: Oh no! {laughs}

name: Stewie
line: Oh, Jenga, there it is! {laughs} Oh well, I guess that's why they call it Jenga, Mm? {laughs again}

name: LaDonne
line: Stewie! You are so cute I can't even stand it!

name: Stewie
line: Oh, thank you. I'm having a good time too. I hope I don't make any social faux pas, like I did at Pamela and Tommy Lee's dinner party.

name: Stewie
line: Hi, Sorry I'm late. I was visiting my aunt in the hospital, she has hep...atitis...Oooo, sorry.

name: Cecilia
line: Neil is such an amazing guy. We just make an absolutely perfect couple.

name: Meg
line: Y'know, Neil liked me first. And I WAS gonna go out with him when I was ready to settle for him. Get your own spaz!

name: Gym teacher
line: All right, ladies, enough chit-chat. Take it off, get in the shower, and bounce around for me.

name: Lois
line: Sweetie, your daddy and I are going to the movies tonight. How would you like LaDonne to babysit?

name: Stewie
line: YES! Oh, I'm going to wow her tonight, Rupert. I'm gonna be cooler than Brian when he hangs out at the bowling alley.

name: Brian
line: That's what I love about high school girls, I keep gettin' older, they stay the same age {chuckles}, yes they do, yes they do.

name: Meg
line: Please go out with me. I'm just trying to make Neil jealous. I promise I'll pay and everything.

name: GUY
line: Yeah, uh, that sounds cool, but I'm gonna be in the hospital that night.

name: LaDonne
line: Hi, gorgeous man.

name: Stewie
line: Oh, you. Must I lock up your tongue with the rest of the silver? {laughs}

name: LaDonne
line: Stewie, this is Jeremy.

name: Jeremy
line: Hey, little man. So you're the guy who's been trying to steal my girlfriend.

name: Stewie
line: Wha-you...GIRLFRIEND?! Oh, what kind of sick, twisted game are you playing at?

name: LaDonne
line: Stewie sounds a little cranky. I'll put him to bed.

name: Stewie
line: HA! I got your hat! Take that, hatless! Now go back to the quad and resume your hackey-sack tourney! I'm not going to lie down for some frat boy bastard with his damn Teva sandals and his Skoal Bandits and his Abercrombie and Fitch long-sleeve, open stitched, crew-neck henley smoking his sticky buds out of a soda can while watching his favorite downloaded Simpson episodes every night! Yes, we all love Mr. Plow - oh, you've got the song memorized, do you? SO DOES EVERYONE ELSE! That is exactly the kind of idiot you see at Taco Bell at one in the morning - the guy who just whiffed his way down the bar-skank ladder.

name: LaDonne
line: Goodnight, Stewie.

name: Stewie
line: If he wants to throw hands, I'll throw hands! I tell you...{LaDonne puts a pacifier in Stewie's mouth}

name: Meg
line: Oh, hey. Neil and Cecilia. I didn't expect to see you here! Meet Jake, my boyfriend!

name: Jake
line: I want some BB's! My dad lets me shoot at cats!

name: Cecilia
line: Oh! Hi Meg! Neil and I are celebrating our two-week anniversary! Oh, it seems like only yesterday he was only a stranger videotaping me through the window.

name: Meg
line: Big deal. He did that to me 3 years ago. AND he gave me the tapes for Christmas.

name: Cecilia
line: He gave me DVDs. The production values were amazing, much better than Kramer vs. Predator.

name: Kramer
line: You want him back? You can't just dissapear for three months and suddenly decide you want him back! You can't have him! {swipes a glass of wine into the wall}

name: Meg
line: Well, I'm glad Neil's over me anyway. I'm with Jake now. Right, Jake?

name: Jake
line: Maybe someday we'll get married and you can go up on me.

name: Meg
line: Neil! I want to be your girlfriend!

name: Neil
line: What?

name: Meg
line: I was wrong to drive you away. We belong together.

name: Neil
line: Of course I'm understandibly skeptical of your newfound affection for me.

name: Meg
line: You still got that contract our dads drew up?

name: Meg
line: Gimme that!

name: Cecilia
line: {talking to Jake} You wanna hook up?

name: Jake
line: BUY ME SOMETHING!

name: Meg
line: I can't believe we're going out. This is so cool!

name: Meg
line: Neil, Neil, n-not so fast.

name: Neil
line: {laughs} Uh, Meg, you need to fufill your contractual obligations.

name: Meg
line: What are you talking about?

name: Neil
line: All right, Meg, according to the contract, every night, you have to put on my pajamas. My mom's record is 12 seconds.

name: Meg
line: Neil, I think you're old enough to-

name: Neil
line: {cutting Meg off} GO!

name: Stewie
line: Oh, LaDonne, I thought we could watch a DVD together. I picked up the first season of Jiminy Glick, oh, imagine being that guy for a day.

name: Stewie
line: {Stewie keeps changing positions on the chair} Colin Farrell! So, I was talking to my wife, Dixie, the other day, and she was saying that you weren't a very good actor. And I agreed with her. Now, now why, now why Colin? Why would we both say that?

name: Stewie
line: All right, that's it! Jeremy must be destroyed!

name: Jeremy
line: Mom?

name: Jeremy
line: Dad? Mom? Is anyone there.

name: Jeremy
line: Uh...little man? Y-you in here?

name: Stewie
line: I say, I think this is how you change a tire, but what would I know? I'm just a baby!

name: Stewie
line: Here's your iPod, so you can listen to The Streaks while you gasp for air!

name: Stewie
line: Oh, The Strokes, right.

name: Mort
line: Boy, this was a better aquisition than I thought. We may even be able to put in some sorghum this year.

name: Stewie
line: So, uh, anyway, um, hey! I made you a mix tape! I don't have a dual cassette player, so I had to hold the tape recorder up to the radio, so the quality's kinda sucky, but, y'know, all the songs describe my feelings.

name: LaDonne
line: I'm sorry, Stewie. I'm just upset. Jeremy stopped calling me.

name: Stewie
line: HE WHAT? That blaggard! Oh, come here, let me just, let me just hold you for a while.

name: LaDonne
line: Stewie, NO! That is a bad place to touch! No! No no no no no no no.

name: Stewie
line: B-But...but I...I...you...I...Waaaaaaaah! [Stewie starts crying]

name: LaDonne
line: No more TV!

name: Stewie
line: Well, how about no more job? Hmm? You hear that miss fussybritches? I shall see you fired, damn you! I thought we were going to go all the way and die together like Hitler and Eva Braun!

name: Hitler
line: We do everything together, ja?

name: Eva
line: Ja.

name: Hitler
line: You got your poison?

name: Eva
line: Mmm.

name: Hitler
line: Ok, one...two...three.

name: Hitler
line: You didn't do it!

name: Eva
line: You didn't do it either!

name: Hitler
line: Ok, ok, all right, this time we really have to do it. Ok, ready? Ok.

name: BOTH
line: One, two...

name: EVA
line: You want me to kill myself and you're not going to! You suck! You suck!

name: HITLER
line: You suck!

name: Brian
line: Hey Stewie, there's something thunkin' around in the trunk of my car and I can't get in there because somebody busted the lock. You have, uh, any idea what that's about?

name: Stewie
line: Oh? Oh, that, pfft. It's this whole, it's this whole crazy thing.

name: Lois
line: Hey, this is not a barn, young lady.

name: Meg
line: Ugg, I'm just so exhausted! You know, I thought I'd be happy being with Neil, but I'm not! This is horrible! {starts crying}

name: Lois
line: Oh, sweetheart, we'll figure out some way to get you out of this. Brian, did you find any loopholes in the contract?

name: Brian
line: Nope, it's airtight. The only way out is if Neil commits an infidelity.

name: Peter
line: Well, that's it then, we gotta find somebody to seduce Neil.

name: Lois
line: Who, me?

name: Peter
line: Well, if not you Lois, than who? Beverly D'Angelo? Cause I don't think she'd do it. And I don't even know how to get a hold of her.

name: Stewie
line: Oh, hello, LaDonne. Listen, I certainly hope you'll excuse last night's indescretion, it was just--oh my God, LaDonne! What's that on your neck?

name: Stewie
line: LOIS! Oh thank God you're here, Lois! It was all her friends, they, they were doing marijuana and heroin! (pronounces it "haro-een" and marijuana, "mara-ju-ana") And they were taking Exema and touching each other!

name: Lois
line: LaDonne, wake up this instant! {kicks LaDonne}

name: LaDonne
line: Wha? I dunno...

name: Lois
line: You know what? Don't bother LaDonne! You are fired!

name: LaDonne
line: Well, I really don't know how this happened, but I guess this is the last time I get to see you. I'm...I'm gonna miss you, little guy. Oh {reaches into purse, pulls out a tape} this is for you.

name: Stewie
line: She...she made me a mix tape?! Oh dear God, what have I done?! I've made a terrible mistake!

name: Peter
line: All right, you all set honey?

name: Lois
line: {from inside the room} Oh, I can't believe I'm doing this. It's so disgusting, but it's for my little girl.

name: Meg
line: Dad, how do you know Neil will show up?

name: Peter
line: Don't worry, Meg. I sent him an invitation he couldn't refuse.

name: Neil
line: Hmm....strange...these conventions usually have Segway parking.

name: Neil
line: Hello? Am I too late for the Q and A?

name: Lois
line: Yeah, but you're just in time for the T and A. {growls}

name: Neil
line: Mrs. Griffin! What are you--

name: Lois
line: Shh, you can call me Mystique.

name: Neil
line: Mrs. Griffin! This is wrong!

name: Peter
line: Well, well, well. Look at this, Meg. Your boyfriend is violating both your contract and my wife.

name: Neil
line: Meg! I wasn't doing anything! Mrs. Griffin was just-- OWW, you're bending it.

name: Meg
line: I don't care. You've nullified the contract. I'm free! {laughs}

name: Neil
line: Free? I don't understand, Meg. You don't want to be my girlfriend?

name: Meg
line: Well, I thought I did, but I guess I was just jealous.

name: Neil
line: I see. Well, Meg, I want you to be with me because you WANT to be with me, not because you have to.

name: Meg
line: Thank you, Neil.

name: Neil
line: Cecilia? It's The Gold-man. How 'bout we fire up the ol' Segway and find a nice, quiet field to do long division in? I-I mean 'a nice, quiet field in which to do long division', sorry. {holds hand up to the phone} Sorry, everybody. {back to talking on the phone} Ok, I'm on my way.

name: Meg
line: He's going back to Cecilia? I can't believe I'm actually jealous.

name: Lois
line: I can't believe I actually touched him.

name: Peter
line: I still can't believe it's not butter! {laughs} Next week, I run for mayor of Quahog. Do I have what it takes? We'll find out, don't miss it.

name: Meg
line: Well, here we are again. Another Saturday night with basic cable.

name: Stewie
line: Yep. {sigh} I suppose none of us are really cut out for love, and we--OH MY GOD! JEREMY'S STILL IN THE TRUNK! Oh God, how long's it been? Uh...let's see...two weeks, yep. Yep, he's dead. Definitely dead.

name: s like I tell the other volunteers down at the adoption center
line: My God, you know, if I could just take all the orphans in the world... and just, you know, buy a farm somewhere... and let them all run free, you know.

name: Just as I thought
line: France, art... murder?

name: A little hint
line: all the answers have to do with something here at the school.

name: Peter
line: You know what grinds my gears? This Lindsay Lohan. You just get up there half-naked and what? Jiggling them little things about. What do you want? What do you want, Lindsay? Tell me what you want! I'll tell you what you want: nothing! You want nothing that's what you want. And that's "What grinds my gears."

name: Lois
line: Us women can be stupid sometimes. That's why I went back to men.

name: Meg
line: oh... okay, mom... See you later. [walks out]

name: Chris
line: [moves closer to Lois] Go on...

name: Diane
line: And now, neglectful father and Quahog's newest social pariah, Peter Griffin, with another segment of "Grind My Gears". Peter?

name: Peter
line: Thank you, Diane. You know what really grinds my gears? People in the nineteenth century. Why don't they get with the freakin' program? It's called an automobile, folks. It's much faster than a horse! Oh. Well, it appears I've been fired. Well, as long as I‚Äôm no longer working here, let me tell you something; you know what really grinds my gears? You, America. FUCK you!

name: Brian
line: So, is it just pool water that turns you into a sniveling girl, or all water?

name: Stewie
line: Mom! Brian just asked me if it's just pool water that turns me into a sniveling girl, or all water!

name: Peter
line: You know, that really grinds my gears. Where in the bible does it say that a man can't fire off some knuckle-children in the privacy of his own neighbor's living room while his neighbor's at work because I don't have a DVD player? Well, I don't know where it says it because the Bible was way too long to read!

name: Stewie
line: Hell? Well, that's a bit much, don't you think? Sure I've devoted my life to killing my mother, but who hasn't? You know for Hell, this isn't really that bad.

name: Diane Simmons
line: Now, let's go to Ollie Williams with the Adopt-a-Pet of the week.

name: Ollie Williams
line: Who wants this dog!?

name: Diane Simmons
line: Thanks, Ollie. And now, let's go to Peter Griffin with "Ya Know What Really Grinds My..."

name: Diane Simmons
line: Tom, what are you doing? You don't work here anymore.

name: Tom Tucker
line: Well, Diane, I have an exclusive story. And I can't figure out how to check my e-mail from home.

name: Ollie Williams
line: Did you check your TCP/IP settings!?

name: Tom Tucker
line: Yes I did, Ollie.

name: Ollie Williams
line: Enable cookies!?

name: Tom Tucker
line: Yes, Ollie.

name: Ollie Williams
line: You want this dog!?

name: Tom Tucker
line: No, thank you, Ollie.

name: Lois
line: Come on, Stewie, there's no need to be afraid, it won't bite you.

name: Stewie
line: Shut up! Stupid! What a stupid thing to say! You drown in it, you moron! It doesn't have to bite you!

name: Peter
line: You know what really grinds my gears? Nobody's come up with a new priest and a rabbi joke in like thirty years. You know? I mean, okay, ah, umm. Priest and a rabbi go, go onto the supermarket, and, uh, the priest wants to buy a ham. And the rabbi says, "Ah, I can't eat it. It's forbidden." Couldn't eat it. Not allowed, pigs are like superheroes to them. Is it perfect? No, but I, I don't see you coming up with anything. And that, people, is what grinds my gears.

name: Stewie
line: [after Brian walks in on Stewie shaving himself] Umm, you know, feel free to say no to this, but... would you shave my coin purse?

name: Peter
line: Hey, Stewie. How about Daddy teaches you how to swim?

name: Stewie
line: Go... away... fat man. [Peter picks up Stewie] Dah! What do you think you're doing? No means no!

name: Peter
line: Come on, Stewie! In... the... pool!

name: Stewie
line: No! No, I don't want to die! I want to live! Live!

name: Peter Griffin
line: Another thing that grinds my gears is when I can't find the droids I'm looking for.

name: Stormtrooper
line: Yeah, me too. What gives with that?

name: Stewie
line: Look, I really don't want to go to hell, but I can't stop my nature. I'm just a hateful person.

name: Brian
line: You're not hateful you just need to control your anger. Like I do.

name: Stewie
line: Oh, you mean by being sauced all day! Wait a minute! Of Course! That's it! If I'm drunk I'll be calm and if I'm calm I'll be nice, and if I'm nice, then I won't go to hell. Fix me a highball I'm going to get good and tight!

name: Gandhi
line: [doing stand-up comedy] And Americans are all like, "Hey, bitch!" and the Indian people, we do not call our women in such a way.

name: Tom Tucker
line: Pay attention to me! I'm trying to ruined you! You want to see me, sir?

name: Stewie
line: OK, now, if I get a fax, can I stay online and still receive the fax without a dedicated line?

name: Foreign Employee
line: Yeah, you can put a piece of paper in here and make, like, a phone call, and your friend will get another piece of paper with the same picture.

name: Stewie
line: ...Can I possibly speak to someone who didn't come to this country on a floating door?

name: Lois
line: Kids, can we have some privacy please?

name: Peter
line: Yeah, you guys are more annoying than that announcer on those TV commercials.

name: Al Harrington
line: Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man! Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man! Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man! Hi, I'm Al Harrington, President and CEO of Al Harrington's Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man Emporium and Warehouse! Thanks to a shipping error, I am now currently overstocked on Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Men, and I am passing the savings onto YOU! Attract customers to your business, make a splash at your next presentation, keep Grandma company, protect your crops, confuse your neighbours! African-American? Hail a cab! Testify in Church or just raise the roof! Whatever your Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man needs are, so come on down to Al Harrington's Wacky Waving Inflatable Arm Flailing Tube Man Emporium and Warehouse! Route 2 in WEEKAPAUG!

name: Peter
line: Before you know it, Meg will be beating guys off with two hands!

name: Stewie
line: Forgive me, Mr. Oinkbaum, you will be missed. [hits piggy bank with a hammer] There we are.

name: Brian
line: What are you doing?

name: Stewie
line: None of your beeswax, Ramona. But if you must know, I need a plane ticket to San Francisco.

name: Brian
line: Pfah! Good luck, plane tickets are about 450 bucks.

name: Stewie
line: Four hundred... Brian, hit me in the mouth.

name: Brian
line: What? Why?

name: Stewie
line: I hear this Tooth Fairy gives you money for your teeth. Have at it!

name: Brian
line: Uh, OK. [goes to take a swing at Stewie]

name: Stewie
line: NO, NO, DON'T, DON'T, DON'T, STOP, STOP! [Brian lowers his fist] Why did you stop? I said hit me!

name: Brian
line: You flinched.

name: Stewie
line: Well, of course I flinched, you were going to hit me!

name: Brian
line: Well make up your mind! What do you want me to do?

name: Stewie
line: Hit me! [Brian tries again] ARGH! No, no! Don't! Don't! [Brian sighs] I'm sorry, look, I know I'm being hard to read- OOF!

name: Stewie
line: Oh, there you are. I thought you should- What are you doing?

name: Brian
line: Paying bills.

name: Stewie
line: What bills? You have bills?

name: Brian
line: Well, there's cable and-

name: Stewie
line: Peter pays for the cable!

name: Brian
line: It's at this, uh...It's at this girl's house. Do you want something?

name: Stewie
line: Yes. I'm still short for my trip. I've only got $200. I suggest you pony up the difference immediately or I'll e-mail the contents of your hard drive to the F.B.I.!

name: Brian
line: What are you talking about? There's nothing on there. [Stewie shows him a nude picture of himself on Brian's computer] Stewie, why is it so hard to accept that Peter's your real father?

name: Stewie
line: Because he's an idiot. You remember that time he went to The Today Show?.

name: Katie Couric
line: Coming up on Today. Tom Cruise has a new movie. We're gonna be talking to him.

name: Peter
line: [knocking on glass] Katie.

name: Katie Couric
line: Funnyman Al Franken will be stopping by for a visit.

name: Peter
line: [knocking on glass] Katie!

name: Katie Couric
line: And Wolfgang Puck shares his recipe for apple strudel.

name: Peter
line: [knocking on glass] Katie!

name: Katie Couric
line: So stay tuned because we've got all this and more coming up in the next hour.

name: Peter
line: [breaks through glass and yells..] Katie!

name: Katie Couric
line: WHAT!?

name: Peter
line: Oh, well, never mind.

name: Quagmire
line: Hey, Brian, what do you think of my sign?

name: Brian
line: Quagmire's Cross Country Tour. Uh, Isn't there an 'O' in Country?

name: Quagmire
line: No. Look out, California, here I come! He he he!

name: Stewie
line: California! [takes his tryke and throws it in the Winnebago]

name: Brian
line: What are you doing?

name: Stewie
line: Well, you heard Captain Syphilis, we're going to California!

name: Stewie
line: Oh, they won't even know we're gone. [pulls a pad out from his pocket and pushes a button. A robot Stewie and a robot Brian come out of Stewie's closet]

name: Robot Stewie
line: Damn you, vile woman. Blast. What the deuce?

name: Robot Brian
line: I am a tool. Stewie is much better than me at everything including arts and crafts and the guitar. I have no friends.

name: Quagmire
line: Glad you guys are joinin' me.

name: Stewie
line: Hey, did you guys see Three Men and a Baby?

name: Brian
line: Yeah.

name: Stewie
line: Did you know there's a ghost in there behind the window?

name: Brian
line: That's an urban legend. It's just a piece of cardboard.

name: Stewie
line: No, it's a ghost. I heard.

name: Brian
line: You heard from who?

name: Stewie
line: From, um...uh...Lois?

name: Brian
line: Yeah, right.

name: Stewie
line: Cleveland?

name: Brian
line: No.

name: Stewie
line: Death?

name: Brian
line: No.

name: Stewie
line: Greased Up Deaf Guy?

name: Brian
line: He said that?

name: Brian
line: What are you doing?

name: Stewie
line: Your knight was at king's rook six.

name: Brian
line: No, my bishop was at king's rook six. My knight was at queen five.

name: Stewie
line: No, no, no.

name: Brian
line: Yes. Yes. I was sitting right- I saw right-

name: Stewie
line: No. In your dreams your knight was at queen five. Yeah...

name: Stewie
line: Oh! Look at that! Look at that! Now your knight is at refrigerator five.

name: Brian
line: That's real mature.

name: Stewie
line: Yeah, well, who comes out a winner? Me. [imitates audience cheering] Griffin once again. Undefeated champion of the world!

name: Brian
line: Are you alright?

name: Stewie
line: NEVER BETTER! I GOT SOME PEP PILLS FROM A TRUCKER AT THE LAST STOP! KEEPS ME AWAKE!

name: Brian
line: You took pills?

name: Stewie
line: WEST COAST TURNAROUNDS! TRUCKER SAID TO ONLY TAKE ONE, BUT I TOOK ALL OF THEM!

name: Brian
line: Look, maybe you should slow down...

name: Stewie
line: WHY? WE'RE MAKING GOOD TIME!

name: Brian
line: We're not even on the road.

name: Stewie
line: HUH?

name: Brian
line: I said we're not even on the road!

name: Stewie
line: DON'T NEED TO BE! COMPASS SAYS WEST, THAT'S WHERE WE'RE HEADED!

name: Brian
line: Stewie, we're in the middle of the desert.

name: Stewie
line: I KNOW! IMAGINE THE NADS ON THOSE GUYS WHO DID THIS IN A WAGON! PIONEERS, BRIAN! WE SHARE THEIR SPIRIT! MANIFEST DESTINY!

name: Brian
line: OK, that's it, give me the wheel!

name: Stewie
line: GO TO HELL!

name: Stewie
line: Oh my god, Brian! Do you see what I see?

name: Brian
line: A Dr. Pepper machine!

name: Stewie
line: Yes! I can taste it now! [The two rush to the machine laughing, then get there and their faces fall]

name: Brian
line: Dammit, it was a mirage.

name: Stewie
line: Ugh, an RC Cola machine...

name: Wilford Brimley
line: Hi, I'm Wilford Brimley and I have diabetes. It hurts me to pee and it causes me to be short with my family. I can't sleep at night. The other day I stubbed my toe and took it out on the dog. And two weeks ago I ran out of vanilla ice cream and struck my wife. Then I find out my wife has been dead for six years. Who the hell did I hit?

name: Lois
line: Chris, I'm gonna teach you to be an affable, desirable young man who doesn't smell like the inside of a wool hat.

name: Chris
line: Why you gotta break balls?

line: Hey, Lion-O, what's going on?

name: O
line: I'm not sure, Cheetara. But, I've gotta bad feeling Mumm-Ra is up to something.

name: Cheetara
line: Hmm. I'll be right back. I'll be right back I'm gonna use the john.

name: O
line: Eye of Thundera give me sight beyond sight.

line: Lion-O, what are you doing? Snarf, snarf.

line: Oh, hey, uh. Not much, not much. You wanna do uh, get wasted or something?

name: Stewie
line: Smells like Head and Shoulders, but you don't have dandruff.

name: Stu
line: Exactly!

name: Stewie
line: Aah!

name: Stewie
line: [to Stu] I could handle the crappy apartment and the pedestrian job, but now you're telling me I'm a 35-year old Parade magazine reading virgin?!

name: Stewie
line: [whispering to Stu] You listen to me Stewart Griffin! You march in there right now and [looks into a book] insert your penis into her vagina!

name: s boss at work
line: Hey, Stew! I heard about what you did with Fran last night. Y'know, Interoffice sex is prohibited, regardless how hilariously brief and unsatisfying it was. You're fired.

name: Stu
line: Can I still read Parade?

line: NO, YOU STILL CAN'T READ PARADE!

name: Stu
line: We'll have to borrow the money from Mommy and Daddy. [Stewie leaps onto Stew's head and peels back his eyelids] AH!

line: Never call them that again! It's Lois and the Fatman! Do you hear me?

name: Stu
line: Yes, yes!

name: Vanessa
line: Ah, screw him! That fuckin' kid's from Guam. Probably only speaks Spanish or some shit.

name: Stewie
line: Let me tell you something, Nessa, a bullet sounds the same in every language. So stick a fucking sock in it, you cow.

name: Old Lois
line: Hi, Glenn. How's your arthritis?

name: Old Quagmire
line: Good, but since you walked in here I'm feeling a little stiff. Giggity Gig...oh, I just pooped a little.

name: Old Cleveland in a slow voice
line: Oh... that's... nas... ty.

name: We now return to
line: Freddy got fingered.

name: Our top story
line: a local woman loses her sex drive

name: Peter Griffin
line: Ah, see, that's an even more beautiful sight than 72 virgins waiting in Heaven for a suicide bomber!

name: Suicide Bomber
line: [gleefully] Here I am! [looks shocked to see a bunch of male happy sci-fi geeks in costumes playing on computers]

name: Nerd in Wizard Costume
line: [looks up, smiling] We're playing "Magic: The Gathering"! Wanna join?

name: Suicide Bomber
line: [angrily yells at sky] OSAMA!!!!

name: Peter Griffin
line: [furious] We don't know him! In fact, he could possibly not even be a real boy! He could be just two crafty dwarves in an overcoat, wanting to see what sex with a big person's like! Is that what you want, Lois?! Two crafty dwarves in an overcoat gettin' in bed with your only daughter... Wait, do dwarves grant wishes?

name: Lois Griffin
line: No, Peter. They're ordinary people, just like you and me.

name: Peter Griffin
line: Well, goodbye phone in the bathroom, but still, Lois, its the same point I'm trying to make!

name: Hartman
line: Mr. and Mrs. Griffin, I'm afraid your coma's in a daughter. [bursts out laughing] I mean, I mean... I mean your daughter's in a coma! What-- oh my God, did, did you hear what I said?! [babbles] Brain freeze! [laughs] Oh, my God! Oh, that one is going in the Christmas letter!

name: Peter Griffin
line: I never realized how much I've taken her for granted. I mean, she's my only daughter, and I feel like I never treated her as well as I should have.

name: Peter Griffin
line: Hey, Meg, you got something on your shirt. [points to her shirt. She looks down, and he flicks her nose and laughs.

name: Meg Griffin
line: Hi, Dad. [Peter quickly pulls out a gun and shoots her; she falls over, bleeding]

name: Lois Griffin
line: Oh, don't be too hard on yourself, Peter. We all do things that we're not proud of.

name: Peter Griffin
line: Well, I am gonna change! You hear me, Meg? If you come out of this, I am gonna treat you like a princess for the rest of your life. 'Cause I've been a worse father than Abraham.

name: Isaac
line: You wanna tell me what the fuck THAT was!?

name: Stewie
line: Hey, Brian. Knock-knock.

name: Brian
line: Who's there?

name: Stewie
line: [whispering] Two friends building a house together.

name: Meg Griffin
line: Yeah, and I can't believe how you stood up to Connie D'Amico for me.

name: Amico
line: Hey, Meg.

name: Meg Griffin
line: Uh, hi, Connie.

name: Amico
line: I can't fit all my books in my locker. Could I put the rest of them on your ginormous ass? [she and her friends laugh. Peter walks in]

name: Peter Griffin
line: Hey, Connie. Hi, Peter Griffin. Meg's father. Say, uh, can you do me a favor? Uh, you see that fire extinguisher there? [Peter starts smashing her head in it repeatedly]

name: Meg Griffin
line: Dad, that's enough! [tries to pull him away] Dad, that's enough! THAT'S ENOUGH, DAD!

name: Stoneberg
line: So, why exactly do you want this separation?

name: Fred Flintstone
line: Well, Mr. Stoneberg, in a nutshell, the cat put me outside. I was banging on the door for like, twenty minutes shouting, "Wilma!"

name: Wilma Flintstone
line: I didn't hear you.

name: Fred Flintstone
line: Oh, there's no way you didn't hear me.

name: Wilma Flintstone
line: I was in the shower.

name: Fred Flintstone
line: Oh, she was in the shower.

name: Wilma Flintstone
line: [overlapping with Fred] The elephant's trunk was on full blast; I couldn't hear you. And besides, you're always yelling about something! How the hell am I supposed to know when to pay attention?!

name: Fred Flintstone
line: [overlapping with Wilma] You could have been right on the other side of the door, and you wouldn't have done a damn thing! All you do is spend my money on expensive clothes and hair-dos! [wilma stops] But when I wanna get my rocks off, you're nowhere to be found, you passive-agressive bitch!

name: Peter
line: I just want to talk to him.

name: Meg
line: Why do you have a shotgun?

name: Peter
line: I just want to talk to him.

name: Meg
line: Dad, this is ridiculous!

name: Peter
line: I just want to talk to him.

name: Meg
line: Put that gun away!

name: Peter
line: I just want to talk to him.

name: Meg
line: What are you doing, it's not his fault.

name: Peter
line: I just want to shoot him.

name: Lois Griffin
line: Look, Why don't you just talk to him? You might find out he's not so bad.

name: Peter Griffin
line: Alright, Lois, but I know what my gut tells me. [turns and faces the camera] And right now, it's telling me I have... [the word "Indigestion" appears over his stomach, which swells]

name: Deep Voice
line: INDIGESTION!

name: Peter Griffin
line: But, I'll suck it up and talk to Michael. [turns his backside to the camera] Even though I've also got... [the word "Diarrhea" appears on his butt, which also swells]

name: Deep Voice
line: DIARRHEA!

name: Michael
line: Uh, Meg, I'm not sure, but I think your dad is sitting at that table over there.

name: Meg Griffin
line: What? Where?

name: Michael
line: Well, I can't tell if it's him. I, I think he's wearing some kind of disguise. [camera pans to the right to reveal Peter sitting at another table, dressed in a stereotypical Asian man disguise]

name: Meg Griffin
line: Oh my God, Dad! [she and Michael walk up to him] What do you think you're doing?

name: Meg Griffin
line: [annoyed] I didn't say "Peter". I said "Dad"!

name: Peter Griffin
line: [has a slow look of realization on his face; still in fake Asian accent] Ohhhhhhhhh...

name: Stewie
line: All right, Brian, I'm gonna go up to the upper level and run this wire down through the wall. Grab your walkie; I'll call you when I get up there.

name: Brian
line: Okay. [Stewie leaves with the wire and a walkie-talkie]

name: Stewie
line: Brian, pick up. Over.

name: Brian
line: What?

line: Brian, please say "over" when you finish talking. Over.

name: Brian
line: What? Over.

line: Do you see the wire yet? Over.

name: Brian
line: No.

name: Stewie
line: No... what? Over.

name: Brian
line: No. Over.

name: Stewie
line: Okay, I'm gonna start feeding it through. Over.

line: Wait, if you haven't started feeding it, why'd you ask me if I could see it?

line: Didn't copy that. Over.

name: Brian
line: I said, why'd you ask me if I could see it if you haven't started feeding it? Over.

name: Stewie
line: Oh, that's better, I can hear you now. Over. You see it yet? Over.

name: Brian
line: You know, you're a jackass. For the record, I don't wanna hang out with you anymore when this is over.

line: When this is what, Brian? Over.

name: Brian
line: I said, I don't wanna hang out with you anymore when this is over.

name: Stewie
line: When this is what? You gotta finish your sentence. Over.

name: Brian
line: That's it. My sentence is over.

name: Stewie
line: Your sentence is what, Brian? Over.

name: Brian
line: My sentence is... Wait a minute, I have to say "over" even if the sentence ends with the word "over"?

name: Stewie
line: Ends with the word what, Brian? Over. [the wire finally comes down from the wall]

name: Brian
line: Oh, I see the wire.

name: Stewie
line: You see the wire what, Brian? Over.

name: Brian
line: [grabs the wire and pulls hard] OVER!

name: Stewie
line: So, listen. Uh, we're gonna wanna be leaving now.

name: Brian

name: Stewie
line: Because I just emptied a full tank of gasoline and lit a match; We've got about five seconds. [they run out of the house before it explodes]

line: Uh, he left. Uh, pretty sure he left.

name: Brian

name: Stewie

name: Peter
line: She's my only daughter, Lois. She needs to be protected, like a rare gemstone or the herniated scrotum of an older gentleman.

name: Peter

name: Peter

name: James Woods
line: Hello, officer. Would you be kind enough to remove this trespasser from my home?

name: Peter
line: What are you talkin' about? This is my house!

name: James Woods
line: No, this house belongs to Peter Griffin. [pulls out Peter's wallet] And that's me.

name: Joe
line: [going through the contents] Hm, driver's license, social security card, passport, title to the house... [sighs] This puts me in a tough spot.

name: Lois

name: Joe
line: I know, Lois, but this man has all the paperwork.

name: Brian
line: Oh, come on! This is identity theft!

name: Joe
line: I hate to have to do this, but I'm afraid legally I have no choice. [to Peter] I'm gonna have to ask you to leave, sir.

name: Brian
line: This is so humiliating. For God's sake, I went to Brown, and he's got me out here tied to a post like some kind of... [suddenly a squirrel goes by, and Brian starts chasing it and barking. He goes in circles until he wraps the leash around the post and chokes on it] What the hell? This rope was a lot longer, and now it's somehow gotten shorter. What sort of black magic is this? line: Hi, everyone. Sorry I'm late. I brought a friend home for dinner. [Peter walks in wearing a typical kid's clothes, including a white/green-striped shirt and a red cap] Mom, "Dad", this is Scooter.

name: James Woods
line: A-ha! I should have known! [pulls out a shotgun] Get out of my house right now, you son of a bitch! [Peter runs out of the house as James fires several times. Peter then gets on a child's big wheel and pedals down the street until he crushes it and starts crying in pain like a child]

line: I'll do it. I'll be James Woods. [goes out on the fire escape] From this day forth, I am James Woods! And I'll stick to that story even if nobody believes it. [camera pans down to Vern, one of the Vaudeville duo, now as a ghost]

line: What? Gosh, it's not like the Internet to go crazy about something small and stupid.
