line: Peter, you have to apologize.

name: Peter
line: What, because of a joke?

name: Brian
line: Not just a joke, Peter. A joke that angered some bloggers.

name: Peter
line: (sighs) Well, I guess this ain't the first time I got in trouble for something I said about a woman.

name: Peter
line: Oh, good, we can steal.

name: Joyce
line: And welcome back to The Flow. We're talking to Peter Griffin, the artist behind For Pete's Sake, which has caused outrage with a misogynistic comic. Here's a video of some outrage.

name: Peter
line: Yeah, those boos don't hurt so much 'cause you spent two minutes of the last segment applauding a red velvet cake.

name: Joyce
line: And if that's not bad enough, this morning's cartoon is even worse. Let's put that up.

name: Joyce
line: Mr. Griffin, do you really think this is an appropriate cartoon to run on Gloria Steinem's half-birthday?

name: Peter
line: You sound angry. Did one of your friends get engaged?

name: Joyce
line: You have no idea how offensive you are to women, do you?

name: Peter
line: What? I love women. I bet I can name more porn stars than you. But don't tell my wife how many porn stars I know. I'll get in a lot of trouble. I know all of them, though. There are people who just started an hour ago, and I know them.

name: Peter
line: Man, they seem really upset. I was just trying to make people laugh.

name: Chris
line: Ruff, ruff, ruff!

name: Peter
line: No, no, they're angry, Chris, but they ain't gonna get violent. (A thrown brick shatters through the window.) Oh, cool, that brick I ordered. (Another one comes.) Wait a minute, I didn't order this brick. You may be right, Chris.

name: Lois
line: Peter, this is getting out of hand. I don't feel safe in my own home. Maybe we should get out of Quahog for a while.

name: Brian
line: You know, she's right. We should get out of town till this all blows over.

name: Peter
line: Okay, we'll go, but just give me a minute, I just wanna turn in my last "For Pete's Sake".

name: Peter
line: I'm like Michael Jordan, going out on top amid a flurry of gambling rumors.

name: Lois
line: Peter, where are we?

name: Peter
line: I don't know, I just woke up, too. I tied the steering wheel to my belt. I figure we've been on the road about 20% of the time.

name: Chris
line: Ruff, ruff!

name: Peter
line: Um, I don't know. How long do women hold grudges? Not very long, I'm guessing.

name: Lois
line: Peter, we've been driving all night. Pull over to that gas station. We can use the bathroom and stretch our legs.

name: Peter
line: You got it, babe.

name: Lois
line: Did you call me "babe"?

name: Peter
line: I did.

name: Lois
line: Oh, Peter. (She kisses him.)

name: Meg
line: Ew! Mom?

name: Peter
line: You'll never have this, Meg.

name: Peter
line: Alright, back in the car, kids. For this length of the trip, I was thinking of driving with my shirt off like New Mexico trash.

name: Lois
line: Oh, my God! Our car!

name: Meg
line: Someone's stealing it.

name: Peter
line: Ah, crap. Although, I gotta say, you never get to see somebody else driving your car. It's kind of cool. Kind of weird.

name: Lois
line: We're stuck here, Peter! And we don't even know where we are!

name: Brian
line: Well, there's a sign.

name: Brian
line: Huh, guess we're in a town called Springfield.

name: Stewie
line: Springfield, eh? What state?

name: Brian
line: I can't imagine we're allowed to say.

name: Lois
line: Oh, this Springfield place seems nice. We should visit here again.

name: Brian
line: I don't know, Lois. This seems like a one-shot deal.

name: Peter
line: Guys, we ain't here for fun, all right? We're here to find the police, report our stolen car... Oh, and don't drink the water. Everybody around here looks like they have hepatitis.

name: Chris
line: Ruff, ruff, ruff, ruff!

name: Peter
line: Lois, whip out your boob, give the boy his lunch.

name: Chris
line: Ruff! Ruff, ruff!

name: Brian
line: Yeah, Lois, listen to the man.

name: Lois
line: How about we just go into that store there?

name: Peter
line: Uh, uh, excuse me?

name: Apu
line: Hello. Welcome to the Kwik-E-Mart.

name: Apu
line: Oh, I'm so sorry. Let me unplug that. Oh, such a nuisance! (He unplugs it.)

name: Peter
line: Hello, funny-sounding Cleveland. What's the specialty to the house?

name: APU
line: For you, I'd recommend the donut.

name: Chris
line: Ruff!

name: Meg
line: Yum!

name: Stewie
line: Have you guys seriously never heard of donuts?

name: Apu
line: These are made fresh every day. And then, several days later, we receive them and make them available for purchase.

name: Peter
line: Hey, are these... Are these free? 'Cause I forgot to mention, all our money is in our stolen car.

name: Apu
line: Thank you, come again.

name: Lois
line: Sir, we can pay you back for the donuts when we find our car.

name: Apu
line: You think that I am moved by your sob story? I come from a country where the words for "sewage" and "beverage" are the same.

name: Homer
line: I'll pay for their donuts.

name: Lois
line: Thank you so much, sir.

name: Man
line: For what? I didn't say anything.

name: Lois
line: Oh.

name: Homer
line: It was me.

name: Stewie
line: How come this convenience store has so many shadowy parts?

name: Homer
line: Apu, a dozen donuts for our albino visitors.

name: Peter
line: Wow, for real?

name: Homer
line: No man should be so poor he cannot pay for a donut. I was once you. I couldn't afford donuts. Tell them what I did, Apu.

name: Apu
line: He stole the donuts.

name: Homer
line: I stole the donuts. So, here you go. Twelve. Ten, eight donuts.

name: Lois
line: That's very nice of you, Mister...

name: Homer
line: Simpson. Homer Simpson.

name: Peter
line: We're the Griffins. Peter, Lois, Stewie, and then, uh, you know, the others. Brian, I guess.

name: Homer
line: Well, enjoy your... six donuts.

name: Peter
line: Mmm, yummy. Donut.

name: Homer
line: That's pretty good, but try it like this. (He takes a bite out of his own.) Mmm, donut.

name: Peter
line: Mmm. Donut.

name: Homer
line: I think you and I are gonna get along just okay.

name: WIGGUM
line: Yeah, alright, we'll be there, but if you wanna save us a little time, you can start tracing his body with chalk.

name: HOMER
line: This is the police station. (He whispers.) Be careful. I think some of them might be cops.

name: PETER
line: Oh, hey, there. Cool hat, weird nose. Hey, listen, my car got stolen, I was hoping you could help.

name: WIGGUM
line: Well, we got a procedure for handling alleged crimes around here. Let's see, uh, did you contribute to the policeman's ball?

name: PETER
line: No?

name: WIGGUM
line: Well, that's too bad, 'cause he really needs one. He had an accident last week.

name: LOU
line: Yeah, I tried to jump over a parking meter.

name: WIGGUM
line: Alright, well, with no contribution, your report goes right into the circular file. (He puts the file in a circular file drawer.) I've gotta be honest, I don't usually check this file, so it might be a while until we find that car of yours.

name: LOU
line: Uh, Chief, that excuse to leave you asked for is here.

name: WIGGUM
line: Oh, sorry, I gotta take this. It never ends. (Both of the cops leave.)

name: LOIS
line: Oh, thank you so much for putting us up until we find our car.

name: MARGE
line: And thank you for not being a band of hippie murderers.

name: HOMER
line: And now this again. You bring home two bands of hippie murderers, and suddenly, that's all you're about.

name: MARGE
line: Well, what do you say we have some lunch?

name: LISA
line: Where's Bart?

name: MARGE
line: Well, he's at camp all week. I'm sorry you won't get to meet him. (The families say nothing.)

name: BART
line: Got kicked out of camp. I superglued my counselor's butt cheeks together.

name: MARGE
line: That's terrible. But how did you even get access to his butt cheeks?

name: BART
line: I'm not the only one who got kicked out of camp.

name: MARGE
line: This is Bart. Honey, your hands are filthy. Go wash up for lunch.

name: BART
line: Eat my shorts!

name: STEWIE
line: "Eat my shorts." I love that! Is that a popular expression, like "what the deuce"?

name: BRIAN
line: Probably more popular. Probably... Probably way more popular.

name: BART
line: Well, here's my room. Hey, you wanna see my weapons closet?

name: STEWIE
line: You have a weapons closet, too?

name: TODD
line: Ouch! Jesus heard my mean thought!

name: STEWIE
line: A slingshot! It's so simple and pure. He doesn't need lasers or time machines, just gumballs and marbles and balls of string. He's like something out of Mark Twain!

name: BRIAN
line: Whose real name was Samuel Clemens.

name: STEWIE
line: How... How does that further this conversation?

name: BART
line: Hey, you wanna make a prank phone call?

name: STEWIE
line: Ooh, prank phone call!

name: MOE
line: Moe's Tavern, Moe speaking.

name: BART
line: Uh, yeah, I'm looking for a friend, last name Keybum, first name Lee.

name: MOE
line: Uh, hang on, I'll check. Uh, hey, guys, do I got a Lee Keybum? Come on, look at the stools is there a Lee Keybum? Oh, somebody check the rear, I know I got a Lee Keybum.

name: BARNEY
line: Then you probably shouldn't be handling food.

name: STEWIE
line: Oh, my God, that's amazing! That's the coolest thing ever! Hey, I want a try.

name: BART
line: Okay.

name: MOE
line: Moe's Tavern.

name: STEWIE
line: Hello, Moe? Your sister's being raped! (He hangs up.) Is that... Is that one?

name: LISA
line: So, this is my room. Please excuse the mess. (She puts her stapler in place.) There, that's better.

name: MEG
line: Look at all these trophies! There must be, like, 20 of them!

name: LISA
line: 23. But I'm sure you have a lot of trophies of your own.

name: MEG
line: No. I'm not good at anything.

name: LISA
line: Oh, Meg, I'm sure you're good at something. We just have to find out what it is. After all, Nelson Mandela said it's our obligation to shine.

name: MEG
line: You mean like my oily face and back?

name: LISA
line: No, maybe don't sit on my bedspread, please, but I mean the light within you that makes you an individual. Meg, you need to know that you matter.

name: MEG
line: Really? No one's ever told me I mattered before.

name: LISA
line: That's why you have to say it. So say it.

name: MEG
line: I matter.

name: LISA
line: Louder!

name: MEG
line: I matter!

name: PETER
line: Shut up, Meg, you don't matter!

name: BRIAN
line: Hey, couldn't help but notice there's no seat for me?

name: MARGE
line: Oh, I was under the impression that you were a dog.

name: STEWIE
line: You're right to have that reaction, Marge.

name: BRIAN
line: Well, I just figured, at home I sit with the family, so I assumed that...

name: MARGE
line: Have you ever drunk out of a toilet?

name: BRIAN
line: I don't see what that has to do with the discussion.

name: MARGE
line: Dogs eat in the kitchen.

name: STEWIE
line: Yeah, dogs eat in the kitchen!

name: BRIAN
line: You know, you're eating mostly horse hooves and tallow, right? Are you cool with that? Oh, and the ones that fall on the floor, you just eat those up, too, huh? Oh, yeah, yeah, you do. So, is that... is that, like, your thing? You eat loud?

name: S LITTLE HELPER
line: Arf, arf, arf!

name: BRIAN
line: Uh, I'm sorry, I don't know what... That's a gutter language.

name: LOIS
line: Are you making friends in there, Brian?

name: BRIAN
line: Yep, he's a lot of laughs.

name: PETER
line: Wow, you work at a nuclear power plant? What's that?

name: HOMER
line: I don't know.

name: PETER
line: Pretty impressive. I just work at a brewery.

name: HOMER
line: Oh, my God, you get to work with beer? Wow! What's beer really like?

name: PETER
line: Heh, he's got a big head. (He giggles) Hey, you know... Aw, damn it, I don't have a comic strip anymore.

name: MARGE
line: So, still no word from the police on your stolen car?

name: HOMER
line: Pfft! The cops here are a joke. I bet you and me can find your car on our own.

name: PETER
line: You think so?

name: HOMER
line: Yeah. 'Cause Homer Simpson and Peter Griffin are a great team!

name: PETER
line: A greater team than...

name: HOMER
line: Than...

name: PETER
line: Yeah, keep going. Than something else?

name: HOMER
line: Something else? I don't know what this is.

name: PETER
line: Are you... Okay, I'll do it. Homer Simpson and Peter Griffin are an even greater team than the Air Force!

name: PETER
line: Hold steady, I got them in my sights!

name: HOMER
line: Whoo-hoo!

name: PETER
line: Yeah-heh-hah!

name: BOB
line: Yeah, we did it!

name: HOMER
line: What's he doing here?

name: PETER
line: Uh, we gotta carry him, because he can't fly on his own. We let that other guy try, and look what happened.

name: CLEVELAND
line: No, no, no, no, no, no! (He crashes.)

name: CHRIS
line: Wow, they've made a lot of changes to Quahog.

name: BRIAN
line: Chris, we're in a different town.

name: CHRIS
line: Oh. Is that why there was blood in my stool?

name: BRIAN
line: No, that sounds like a separate issue. God, I can't believe I got stuck taking their stupid dog for a walk.

name: CHRIS
line: Stupid? Well, I don't know, I think he's kind of fun.

name: BRIAN
line: What, are you kidding? He doesn't do anything. You know, it's not his fault, though. He doesn't know any better. He's been on a leash his whole life. Hey, you know what? Come here, Santa's Stupid Name. You're a grown dog, start acting like one.

name: BRIAN
line: Come here, boy.

name: BRIAN
line: Hey, stop that dog!

name: PATTY
line: Sorry, we're on a smoke break.

name: PATTY
line: Nothing beats smoking and standing.

name: SELMA
line: Although smoking and sitting does have its moments.

name: PATTY
line: You always have to argue with me.

name: NICK
line: Oh, thank goodness! I was starting to think you wouldn't show, Dr. Dog.

name: NICK
line: Boy, you really like to bleed, huh, guy?

name: SQUEAKY VOICED TEEN
line: Hey, there's a dog in the dining area!

name: KRUSTY
line: How'd that happen? Get back in there!

name: BRIAN
line: Which one is Santa's Little Helper?

name: CHRIS
line: I don't know, you're the one who sniffed his butt!

name: BRIAN
line: Yeah, for, like, a second!

name: BRIAN
line: Damn it, he's gone. We're screwed.

name: SQUEAKY VOICED TEEN
line: Welcome to Krusty Burger. May I take your order?

name: CHRIS
line: Your voice sounds stupid!

name: STEWIE
line: Oh, my God, that was great! I mean, unless you think it sucked, in which case it sucked.

name: BART
line: It was all right, dude.

name: STEWIE
line: Yeah, dude. So, you know, um, I'm only wearing this diaper as a dare, you know, it's not, like, an everyday thing.

name: NELSON
line: Hey, loser, I copied off your spelling test and got a D! (He gut punches him and Bart falls to the ground.) Ha-ha! (He leaves.)

name: STEWIE
line: I say, how long has that boy been treating you like that?

name: BART
line: Uh, about 24 years.

name: NELSON
line: Just who I was looking for!

name: STEWIE
line: Cowabunga.

name: HOMER
line: Alright, Peter, if we're gonna find your car, we've gotta think like a car. So let's fill up at that gas station.

name: PETER
line: I feel sick.

name: HOMER
line: Keep drinking, I prepaid forty bucks!

name: PETER
line: Homer, maybe we're doing this wrong.

name: PETER
line: Oh, crap.

name: CUSTOMER
line: Haben Sie Homer und Peter MIT Chevron pump?

name: PETER
line: Okay, I got a great idea how we're gonna find my stolen car. We'll throw a car wash, free for stolen cars!

name: HOMER
line: And then when we find it, we'll actually charge the guy!

name: PETER
line: Well, none of these is my car, but we promised these scumbags a show.

name: LOU
line: Hey, Chief, we could arrest every single car thief in Springfield.

name: WIGGUM
line: After the show, Lou. After the show.

name: MEG
line: (yells) I don't know! I feel like I'm good at nothing!

name: LISA
line: Hey, everyone gets down on themselves sometimes. Those are the days I'm glad I have my saxophone.

name: MEG
line: Saxophone?

name: LISA
line: Yeah. My dad gave it to me.

name: MEG
line: My dad once gave me a gun to hide.

name: LISA
line: That's terrible. Whenever I feel any pain or loneliness, I just play away the blues on my saxophone.

name: MEG
line: Huh. I usually just beat up a cat.

name: LISA
line: Good thing we don't have a cat. Why don't you give it a shot?

name: MEG
line: Was that good?

name: LISA
line: It was okay, but it would be a shame to waste such great butcher's arms on a musical instrument.

name: STEWIE
line: Wakey, wakey. Good morning. You and I have quite a day ahead of us.

name: STEWIE
line: Oh, that's a clown I painted, so you know I'm truly insane. (Nelson muffles) You know, Nelson, I don't doubt that you've had a twisted childhood. Most evil people have. Hitler, Manson, Jaden Smith. But you're different from them, aren't you? Because they're rail-thin, and you're fat. You're a little piggy, aren't you, Nelson? In fact, I bet you're hungry right now.

name: STEWIE
line: What's that?

name: NELSON
line: I could eat.

name: STEWIE
line: Good. Because you're going to eat... my... shorts!

name: MARGE
line: Homer, you're never going to believe what we did. We saw a movie in the afternoon!

name: LOIS
line: Yeah, we saw Surf's Up 2. Marge covered her eyes every time the penguins surfed.

name: MARGE
line: It made me nervous. They could drown. Hey, where's Santa's Little Helper? Brian, you took him for a walk, right?

name: BRIAN
line: Uh, yeah, yeah. More like he took me for a walk. God, what a... what a fun dog. He's in the kitchen right now, totally accounted for.

name: BRIAN
line: I'll, uh... I'll go check on him right now, and Chris will come with me. But nobody else!

name: BRIAN
line: Ruff! Ruff, ruff! Ah, there he is! Aw, you like that behind the ear, don't you, boy? Ruff! Ruff, ruff!

name: CHRIS
line: Uh... Ruff, ruff! I'm another dog in here!

name: BRIAN
line: How does that help us?

name: CHRIS
line: We're creating a broad story. (In normal voice) Also, Matthew McConaughey is in here, too! "Alright, alright, alright."

name: BRIAN
line: No, no, he's not really in here! We thought it was him, but it was just the oven! (He whispers) Now you're just doing voices.

name: CHRIS
line: Jack Nicholson?

name: BRIAN
line: Okay, Santa's Little Helper got all tuckered out from his playdate, so he went out back to take a nap under that tree where nobody knows quite where it is.

name: PETER
line: Hey, what happened to Jack Nicholson and that other dog?

name: BRIAN
line: Yep.

name: LOIS
line: Wait, aren't you supposed to be looking for our car?

name: PETER
line: Didn't find the car, Lois, but I found a good time with a good pal. Right, Homer? Hey, Quagmire who, right?

name: HOMER
line: Yeah, Quagmire who? That's an actual question; I don't know who Quagmire is.

name: LOIS
line: Peter, I'm glad you made a friend, but what about our car?

name: HOMER
line: Yeah, I got an idea about that. What's the one surefire way to find a lost car?

name: PETER
line: Giant magnet?

name: HOMER
line: Giant magnet.

name: PETER
line: Giant magnet?

name: PETER
line: Giant plug?

name: HOMER
line: Check.

name: PETER
line: Giant curbside outlet?

name: HOMER
line: Oh, things never work the way they do on the box.

name: PETER
line: Okay, let's get this garbage out of the street.

name: HANS
line: Oh, dear, I was using that car as pants.

name: MEG
line: Oh, my God, Dad, it's our car!

name: CHRIS
line: That confused old guy must have been driving it by mistake.

name: PETER
line: How many confused old guys do you got in this town?

name: ABE
line: I'm old, so I'm the victim!

name: PETER
line: Well, Homer, thanks for helping me get my car back. And to show my appreciation, I got a little something for you. (He pulls out a six pack of beer.) Here you go. Pawtucket Patriot Ale; The best Quahog has to offer. Always keep an emergency six-pack in my trunk.

name: MOE
line: Oh, that's cool, bringing outside beer into my bar.

name: HOMER
line: Down the hatch! (He drinks the beer.)

name: PETER
line: Yeah, it's pretty good, right?

name: HOMER
line: No.

name: PETER
line: Huh?

name: HOMER
line: It's not good. This beer tastes exactly like Duff. It's just a lousy rip-off!

name: PETER
line: Hey, whoa, whoa, whoa! It's not a rip-off of Duff. It may have been inspired by Duff, but I like to think it goes in a different direction.

name: HOMER
line: No, this is just the same as Duff, but, like, worse!

name: PETER
line: Hey, come on, now, this is my favorite beer you're talking about! Hell, I work for the company. It's my livelihood.

name: MOE
line: Oh, yeah? Well, your livelihood is based on fraud. Look at this! (He rips off the label, revealing that it's Duff.) Huh?

name: HOMER
line: (gasps) It is Duff. Your beer is in big trouble! You can't just slap a new label on something and call it your own!

name: PETER
line: Well, maybe Duff should be in trouble for... You know, not being that great.

name: HOMER
line: Duff is an icon!

name: PETER
line: Yeah, but some folks prefer Pawtucket Pat. I mean, don't get me wrong, I used to love Duff when I was younger, but I haven't even had it in, like, 13 years.

name: LAWYER
line: Be that as it may, I represent the Duff Brewery, and you, sir, as a representative of Pawtucket Patriot Ale, are being sued for intellectual theft and patent infringement.

name: HOMER
line: Aha, intellectual theft! What do you have to say about that, Griffin?

name: PETER
line: D'oh!

name: LOIS
line: The Pawtucket Patriot Brewery being sued? It's the largest employer in Quahog, Peter. A lot of people's jobs are riding on this.

name: PETER
line: Yeah, I got a job for you riding on something.

name: LOIS
line: Peter!

name: PETER
line: Sorry! Sorry, Lois, I'm tired, 'cause we usually only do these things for half an hour.

name: PETER
line: Simpson.

name: HOMER
line: Griffin.

name: PETER
line: Nice day, isn't it? Nice day for stabbing a friend in the back.

name: HOMER
line: Yeah, and a nice day for bringing thieves to justice.

name: SUN
line: We're getting a lot of compliments.

name: CLOUD
line: Yep, we're doing something right.

name: LAWYER
line: Your Honor, citizens of Springfield and visitors from Quahog, my client, the Duff Brewery, is the victim of flagrant intellectual theft.

name: LAWYER
line: But it's not just the main Duff recipe that's been plagiarized. Several other Duff variations, packages and design elements have been similarly infringed, resulting again and again in pale imitations, cheap copies, clumsy counterfeits and weak substitutions.

name: GLENN
line: You like sex?

name: LENNY
line: Eh.

name: GLENN
line: I don't think we're very similar.

name: CLEVELAND
line: You know why they got us sitting next to each other.

name: CARL
line: Uh, 'cause we're the two funniest guys in our towns?

name: CLEVELAND
line: Damn right. (They fist bump)

name: KRUSTY
line: I'm a Jewish clown.

name: MORT
line: Me, too.

name: WEST
line: Are you a mayor?

name: QUIMBY
line: Yes, I am.

name: WEST
line: Are you a "cool" mayor?

name: QUIMBY
line: I, uh... I like to think so.

name: QUAHOG WOODS
line: You live in Springfield?

name: SPRINGFIELD WOODS
line: Yeah, I worked at the Kwik-E-Mart, researching a role.

name: QUAHOG WOODS
line: These guys are gonna lose.

name: FRED
line: I've heard all I need to hear to make a decision. If you ask me, neither of these beers is wholly original. They're both pale imitations of my favorite beer, Bud Rock.

name: PETER
line: Oh, ho, ho!

name: HOMER
line: Ooh!

name: FRED
line: But rendering a verdict is something I'm paid to yabba-dabba-do!

name: BOTH
line: Eh.

name: FRED
line: And I find in favor of Duff.

name: LOIS
line: Oh, no!

name: MEG
line: Oh, no!

name: PETER
line: Oh, no! (Nothing happens. He gets a call.) Hello?

name: AID MAN
line: Uh, hey, I'm... I'm in the wrong Springfield.

name: MARGE
line: So what's going to happen now?

name: LOIS
line: Well, the Pawtucket Brewery will be shut down, so I guess we've gotta go back to Quahog and find Peter a new job.

name: MARGE
line: Hmm, that's too bad.

name: LOIS
line: Yeah. Anyways, it was still nice to meet you and your family, even though you kind of screwed us over.

name: MARGE
line: Good to have you. And, hey, next time you stay with a family, maybe you could wear a bra some of the time.

name: BRIAN
line: Hey, uh, Marge, uh, listen, there's something difficult that I've been trying to figure out how to tell you, and, um... It's about, uh, Santa's Little Helper.

name: MARGE
line: What about him?

name: BRIAN
line: He's, um... (Santa's Little Helper appears next to him.) right there.

name: MARGE
line: You were trying to figure out a way to tell me that?

name: BRIAN
line: I overthink things sometimes.

name: CHRIS
line: Oh, and, look, he's with Ed McMahon! "Hey-o! Here's Johnny!"

name: BRIAN
line: Chris, we're done.

name: CHRIS
line: You may be, but "I'm just getting warmed up!" That's Al Pacino.

name: MEG
line: Thanks for being so cool, Lisa. I cut your name in my arm so I'll always remember you.

name: LISA
line: Meg, I want you to have this.

name: MEG
line: Your saxophone?

name: LISA
line: Yes, Meg. When you played the saxophone, I could feel your soul coming out. So, I want you to take this and shine.

name: MEG
line: Lisa, no one has ever done anything this nice for me. You're amazing, and I will never be like you. I'm not pretty, I'm not smart, I'm not talented, I have the same shoe size as Charles Barkley, my prom date was a scarecrow I stole, and he left with someone else, the inside of my hat smells so bad, I'm not allowed in most restaurants...

name: LISA
line: Hey, hey! (sweetly) Shut up, Meg.

name: PETER
line: No luggage, car's full, let's go.

name: BART
line: Well, nice knowing you, Stewie.

name: STEWIE
line: Same here, Bart. Hey, I hope you don't mind, I've got you a little present.

name: BART
line: Whoa, is that Nelson? Stewie, what the deuce?

name: STEWIE
line: Yes, I... Oh! Oh, that's nice. You've got that from me. 'Cause, you know, I was starting to worry this was a one-way thing.

name: BART
line: You kidnapped him?

name: STEWIE
line: I kidnapped all your enemies. Nelson, Jimbo, Principal Skinner, Dolph, Kearney, Sideshow Bob, Apu. I know Apu's not your enemy, but I just wanted to say, "I took a poo." (He chortles.)

name: BART
line: That is funny! But the rest of this is messed up, man.

name: STEWIE
line: I know, Isn't it awesome? So, how do you want to keep in touch? Facebook? Twitter? Late-night phone calls, lying on our tummies with our feet up in the air?

name: BART
line: Stewie, I don't think we can be friends. You freak me out.

name: STEWIE
line: Bart, if we don't keep in touch, I'll kill myself.

name: BART
line: That's what I'm talking about. Later, dude!

name: STEWIE
line: Later... dude.

name: HOMER
line: Aw.

name: HOMER
line: Hey, Griffin, sorry about your job. I was just sticking up for Duff. I love Duff, and Duff loves me. Duff can keep a secret, Duff never says no, Duff is more experimental than any partner I've ever had. Anyway, point is, I'm sorry.

name: PETER
line: You know, when I first met you, I thought, "Hey, I love this guy!" "This is the funniest guy I've ever met!" "I'm gonna quote this guy to all my friends! I love his town, I love his family!" But now, I think I speak for all of us when I say, I am over the Simpsons!

name: PETER
line: I'm saying the Simpsons suck!

name: HOMER
line: Why, you...!

name: HOMER
line: Huh?

name: PETER
line: Ow! What the hell? That really hurts!

name: HOMER
line: No, it doesn't! I do it to my son all the time.

name: PETER
line: You strangle your son? That's insane! No wonder he's fat and stupid and masturbates all the time.

name: HOMER
line: That's your son!

name: HOMER
line: Phew!

name: HOMER
line: Hey, knock it off! There's a kid back there!

name: RALPH
line: Haha, I'm in danger.

name: PETER
line: Hey, that's no fair, I don't got none of them!

name: HOMER
line: Uh-oh.

name: Homer
line: Ooh.

name: PETER
line: Damn it!

name: KRUSTY
line: And remember, kids, TV violence is fine as long as you don't show a nipple.

name: KODOS
line: Perfect. The earthlings are destroying themselves.

name: ROGER
line: Yeah, it's really great, isn't it, guys? We went to summer camp together.

name: ROGER
line: Bye! Thanks for having me.

name: PETER
line: It appears that I am now the only one with radioactive powers, which will allow me to unleash my fury...! (He looses his, too.) Oh, I talked too long.

name: PETER
line: We're gonna make it!

name: HOMER
line: Trust me, we're not.

name: HOMER
line: Whoa!

name: PETER
line: Aah!

name: PETER
line: Whoo-hoo!

name: HOMER
line: Roadhouse.

name: HOMER
line: Say hi to Maude Flanders.

name: PETER
line: No! You say hi to Muriel Goldman.

name: HOMER
line: Who?

name: HOMER
line: What are you still doing here?

name: PETER
line: I think you're gonna get a kick out of this. You're parked behind me at your place.

name: HOMER
line: That is funny.

name: PETER
line: Hey, listen, I... I'm sorry we fought. I just wanted to make you laugh and cry. You see, I'm a Family Guy.

name: HOMER
line: I understand. I'm a The Simpsons.

name: PETER
line: Look, even if we don't work as best pals, I respect you.

name: HOMER
line: You, too. Let's just agree to stay a half hour away from each other.

name: PETER
line: With a pile of garbage between us.

name: COMIC BOOK GUY
line: Worst... chicken fight ever.

name: LOIS
line: It sure is nice to be back in Quahog.

name: MEG
line: Oh, and thank God all the commotion about Dad's comic blew over.

name: PETER
line: Oh, my God, I had a comic? That's hilarious!

name: LOIS
line: Well, you may not be a cartoonist anymore, but you are a local hero for defending our beer, and apparently, that's more important than hating women. So here you go, a Pawtucket Patriot Ale.

name: PETER
line: What? I don't understand. Ain't the brewery out of business? We lost a court case.

name: LOIS
line: Yes, we lost, but how are they gonna enforce it? What, are they gonna come here? I think we know that's never gonna happen.

name: BRIAN
line: Hey, Stewie, I'm sorry Bart didn't want to be your friend.

name: STEWIE
line: What? No! What are you talking about? He was lame. If you ask me, he kind of sounded like a girl.

name: BRIAN
line: Really? Kind of seemed like you idolized him. And I can understand losing a friend and feeling rejected.

name: STEWIE
line: Course you can, you're a loser. But not me, I'm a lone wolf. Speaking of which, I'm gonna go howl at the moon. Don't need nobody.

name: GRACIE
line: Shh.

name: PETER
line: And now the show is over now.

name: Seamus
line: Let's go up there!

name: Chauffeur
line: I've seen some terrible things.

name: s all the stale mail what never got delivered for one reason or the other
line: incomplete addresses, house at the top of a hill, anyone who uses one of those French sevens with a slash in it.

name: s the nutty thing
line: believe it or not, I'm actually married to Peter Griffin right now.

name: Man
line: Peter!

name: you need to know one thing
line: I'm the one throwing out all your beige bras.

name: Lois
line: Hey, Gretchen?

name: Seamus
line: Let's go up there!

line: I've seen some terrible things.

name: s all the stale mail what never got delivered for one reason or the other
line: incomplete addresses, house at the top of a hill, anyone who uses one of those French sevens with a slash in it.

name: s the nutty thing
line: believe it or not, I'm actually married to Peter Griffin right now.

name: Man
line: Peter!

name: you need to know one thing
line: I'm the one throwing out all your beige bras.

name: Lois
line: Hey, Gretchen?
